pages.text: This is what is considered $(d)Tier 3$() in terms of stress generation. $(br2)A single Steam Engine can output a maximum of $(3)16,384su$(). However, you can have a maximum of 9 Steam Engines together on a Level 9 boiler and output $(3)147,456su$() if connected altogether.

Ensure that your Mechanical Pump is rotating at a fast enough RPM and uses a separate source of stress as making a self-sufficient boiler will only cause additional complexity. $(br2)I recommend using a Windmill Bearing as the source of stress for your Mechanical Pump array. $(br2)Turn to the next page to see the recipes of required components.
